subject: College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Tom Osborne, who put together one of the most successful coaching runs in college football history before serving in Congress and taking the reins as Nebraska’s athletic director five years ago, said Wednesday that he would step down Jan. 1.
snippet: Tom Osborne, who put together one of the most successful coaching runs in college football history before serving in Congress and taking the reins as Nebraska’s athletic director five years ago, said Wednesday that he would step down Jan. 1.
